name: Expense/Income (Non-Instrument)
notes: Book income or expense for transactions in the system

actions.condition_expr: (selector_purpose=='Accounting and audit fee' or selector_purpose=='Admin fee' or selector_purpose=='Commission' or selector_purpose=='Custody fee' or selector_purpose=='Interest expense' or selector_purpose=='Other expense' or selector_purpose=='Tax expense') and (reverse=='-')
